page.title: 02THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: The local area is made up of six villages: Holytown Cleland Newarthill New Stevenston Jerviston Carfin Five of these villages are inter_connected. There are close links between the villages. They all share the use of two secondary schools which pupils travel to by bus or on foot. The area is littered with abandoned works. Old mine shafts have caused subsidence in some areas. Empty and run_down factories can be seen throughout the area and large areas of waste ground which once sited large factories are scattered throughout the villages.
